items.title: Apply Saved Appearance Mode on Startup
items.description: App now remembers last appearance mode (Dark, Light, System) on startup.

items.title: New toggle Fullscreen on Startup
items.description:
Toggle to open app on fullscreen or normal window. Saved in INI file.
Added Close button for fullscreen mode.

items.title: Remove Games
items.description:
Roms should now load almost instantly
Fixed issue with rom names not detecting correctly when removing, due to showing friendly names in UI
Rom names are now larger
